Support

While graduate students, young researchers, female mathematicians and members of underrepresented groups are particularly encouraged to apply for travel support, it should be stressed that any participants without their own sources of funding are eligible to apply. Requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis within the limits of the budget. To apply for travel support or to find out more information, please contact one of the organizers. Application deadline is March 15.

  • Gunter Fuchs
  • Victoria Gitman
  • Corey Switzer
